footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: Welcome to the Art of Healing
heroSubtitle1: A space of deep healing, care and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover how Ayahuasca can help you reconnect with your essence and find the answers you seek.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Each ceremony is a unique journey of transformation and connection. These are some moments from our previous gatherings.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us on a journey of healing and self-discovery. Find the date and place that resonates with you.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here. Click save when you're done.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. We've created a complete guide to help you get your body, mind, and spirit ready.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay up to date with our upcoming events, and join our community of healers and seekers.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey with love, respect, and deep wisdom.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide's profile.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral sacred medicine from the Amazon, a decoction of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, it has been used by indigenous peoples for healing, divination, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. It can induce profound visions and introspections, allowing one to access deep parts of the subconscious to release traumas, resolve internal conflicts, and gain a clearer understanding of one's purpose in life.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. The experience is often described as a conversation with one's own soul or with a universal consciousness, offering wisdom and clarity.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of direction and purpose in their lives, with greater clarity about他们的道路和决定。
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of repressed emotional blockages and traumas, leading to deep and lasting healing.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and strengthens the connection with the spiritual, nature, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Healing in community. The group energy creates a powerful container of support and shared experience, where each person's process contributes to the whole.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized journey. This option offers a space of deeper and more focused introspection, ideal for working on specific personal themes with the direct guidance of the shaman.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You have successfully signed in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully created.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive updates about our community.
dietSubtitle: A clean body allows for a clearer experience. The diet begins at least 3 days before and continues for 3 days after the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Lean proteins (chicken, fish, boiled or grilled)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass that will guide your journey. Prepare your mind and spirit to receive the medicine.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open your heart.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to heal, understand, or transform during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and feelings. This helps clarify your intentions.
emotionalHealingDescription: Be prepared to face deep and sometimes challenging emotions. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine. The guides will be there to support you at all times.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound night. Here's a list of what you'll need.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the morning
integrationProcessDescription: Applying the teachings in daily life.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's color scheme (dark mode only). Use HSL values.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our health questionnaire to prepare for your ceremony with El Arte de Sanar. Please register or log in first, and then follow this link: https://elartedesanarcr.com/questionnaire
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear community, we'd like to share...
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by the ceremony guides to ensure a safe experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or natural supplements)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychedelic substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications or supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please describe the mental health history.
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. We have saved your answers.
questionnaireErrorDescription: We couldn't save your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the confidential information provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire has been submitted by this user yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, seeker of light. I am here to guide you on your spiritual path. How may I assist you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
tourWelcomeDescription: We are happy to have you here. Before we start a quick tour, could you provide your phone number? This will help us stay in touch.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We'll use this to send important ceremony reminders via WhatsApp.
tourPhoneNumberError: Could not save your phone number. Please try again.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see short videos and memories from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our upcoming ceremonies. You can click to see details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Now, we invite you to fill out a brief health questionnaire. It is essential to ensure your safety and well-being during the ceremony.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Please provide a video URL or upload a file.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past ceremonies carousel.
deleteVideoConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this video?
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
